import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-customers', templateUrl: './customers.component.html', styleUrls: ['./customers.component.css'] }) export class CustomersComponent implements OnInit { customerList: any = [ "Spar", "Checkers", "Shoprite", "Woolworths", "Pick n Pay" ] constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
